imgDesc.text:
These energy aggregations known as Primal Embers are commonly scattered throughout King Deshret's ruins. Go near to Primal Sconces that contain these Primal Embers to unleash them.
<color=#ffe14b>Follow the Primal Embers to activate the giant Primal Torch</color> . Once the Primal Torch is lit, King Deshret's ruins will also change...

Primal Embers are very fragile, so you will sometimes find Primal Sconces along their travel path that can serve as transit points en route to the Primal Torch.
Primal Ember can also be blown away by the strong winds generated by the giant fan blades. If you wish to help the Embers continue their journey, then you must find some way to stop these fans from operating...
